Definition at line 79 of file MySQL.php.

connect (  ) 

Connects to the defined server and selects the defined database.

Do not use directly. query() will connect the database if it has not been connected already. This method allows the database layer to be instantiated on every page without neccessarily requiring a database connection on each page.

Returns:
void
